faq.title: Pertanyaan Umum (FAQ)
faq.q1: Bagaimana cara download video TikTok tanpa watermark 2026?
faq.a1: Sangat mudah: 1. Buka aplikasi TikTok dan pilih video. 2. Ketuk tombol 'Bagikan' lalu pilih 'Salin Tautan'. 3. Tempel tautan di kotak di atas dan klik 'Unduh'. Video akan tersimpan tanpa logo.
faq.a2: Ya, SaveTikFast sepenuhnya gratis selamanya. Kami tidak meminta biaya langganan, pendaftaran, atau biaya tersembunyi apa pun untuk mengunduh konten favorit Anda.
faq.q3: Apakah bisa di iPhone (iOS) dan Android?
faq.a3: Tentu saja! Alat kami dioptimalkan untuk semua perangkat. Baik Anda menggunakan iPhone, iPad, smartphone Android, atau PC/Laptop, SaveTikFast bekerja sempurna di browser Anda.
faq.q4: Bisakah saya mengunduh video kualitas HD atau 4K?
faq.a4: Ya, algoritma canggih kami secara otomatis mencari resolusi tertinggi yang tersedia (HD, Full HD, atau 4K) langsung dari server sumber dan memberikannya kepada Anda.
faq.q5: Bisakah saya mengunduh lagu/suara TikTok (MP3) saja?
faq.a5: Ya, kami menyediakan fitur khusus 'Download Audio (MP3)'. Cukup tempel tautan video, dan Anda akan melihat opsi untuk mengekstrak dan menyimpan file audio berkualitas tinggi.
faq.q6: Di mana video tersimpan di HP saya?
faq.a6: File biasanya tersimpan di folder 'Unduhan' (Downloads) default browser Anda. Di HP, Anda juga bisa menemukannya di 'File Manager' atau Galeri Foto.
faq.q7: Apakah SaveTikFast menyimpan video yang saya unduh?
faq.a7: Tidak sama sekali. Kami menghargai privasi Anda. Kami tidak menyimpan video di server kami dan tidak melacak riwayat unduhan Anda. Semua proses aman dan anonim.
faq.a8: Pastikan akun TikTok yang ingin Anda unduh bersifat 'Publik', bukan 'Privat'. Juga, periksa kembali apakah Anda telah menyalin tautan video yang benar.
faq.q9: Apakah saya perlu menginstal aplikasi tambahan?
faq.a9: Tidak perlu instalasi. SaveTikFast adalah alat berbasis web. Anda hanya perlu browser web (Chrome, Safari, dll) dan koneksi internet.
faq.a10: Ya, selama Anda menggunakan konten yang diunduh untuk tujuan pribadi dan non-komersial (seperti menonton offline). Harap hormati hak cipta pembuat konten.

about.title: Tentang Kami
about.content:
Selamat datang di SaveTikFast, Pengunduh TikTok terkemuka untuk tahun 2026.

Kami membangun SaveTikFast dengan satu tujuan: menyediakan cara tercepat, teraman, dan paling andal untuk menyimpan video TikTok tanpa watermark. Tidak seperti alat lain, kami memprioritaskan pengalaman penggunaâ€”tanpa iklan yang mengganggu, tanpa pendaftaran, dan tanpa instalasi perangkat lunak.

Teknologi kami memastikan Anda mendapatkan kualitas video asli (hingga 4K) sambil menghapus logo yang mengganggu.

contact.title: Hubungi Kami
contact.content:
Kami menghargai masukan Anda dan siap membantu.

Jika Anda mengalami masalah teknis, memiliki saran perbaikan, atau pertanyaan bisnis, silakan hubungi tim dukungan kami:

ðŸ“§ Email: support@savetik-fast.xyz

Kami berusaha membalas semua pesan dalam waktu 24 jam.

terms.title: Syarat Layanan
terms.content:
Dengan menggunakan SaveTikFast, Anda menyetujui persyaratan berikut:

1. Penggunaan Pribadi:
Layanan kami ditujukan untuk penggunaan pribadi dan non-komersial. Anda boleh mengunduh video untuk ditonton secara offline.

2. Hak Kekayaan Intelektual:
Kami tidak memiliki konten yang diunduh. Semua hak milik pencipta asli di TikTok. Anda setuju untuk tidak menggunakan konten dengan cara yang melanggar hak cipta.

3. Tanggung Jawab:
SaveTikFast tidak bertanggung jawab atas cara Anda menggunakan materi yang diunduh. Pengguna bertanggung jawab penuh atas pelanggaran hak cipta.

privacy.title: Kebijakan Privasi
privacy.content:
Privasi Anda sangat penting bagi kami.

Pengumpulan Data:
Kami tidak mengumpulkan informasi pribadi seperti nama atau email. Kami mungkin menggunakan analitik anonim (seperti cookie) untuk meningkatkan kinerja situs.

Tanpa Penyimpanan Video:
SaveTikFast tidak menghosting atau menyimpan video apa pun di servernya. Semua pemrosesan file dilakukan secara instan.

dmca.title: Kebijakan DMCA
dmca.content:
SaveTikFast menghormati hak kekayaan intelektual orang lain.

Kami beroperasi sebagai penyedia layanan teknis dan tidak menghosting konten berhak cipta. Semua video disajikan langsung dari server pihak ketiga (TikTok).

Jika Anda yakin karya berhak cipta Anda telah ditampilkan di layanan kami tanpa izin, silakan kirim pemberitahuan DMCA resmi ke email kami: support@savetik-fast.xyz.

disclaimer.title: Penafian (Disclaimer)
disclaimer.content:
1. Non-Afiliasi:
SaveTikFast adalah alat utilitas independen dan TIDAK berafiliasi, dikaitkan, disahkan, didukung oleh, atau dengan cara apa pun terhubung secara resmi dengan TikTok Inc. atau ByteDance Ltd.

2. Merek Dagang:
Nama 'TikTok' dan logonya adalah merek dagang terdaftar dari pemiliknya masing-masing.

3. Konten:
Kami tidak memiliki kendali atas konten yang dihosting di server TikTok.

hero.title: Alat Gambar & QR Gratis
hero.desc: Semua diproses di browser Anda. Aman dan cepat.

dropzone.hint_convert: or click to browse (JPG, PNG, WebP, GIF, BMP)

compressor.title: Image Compressor
compressor.desc: Reduce image file size without losing quality. Supports JPG, PNG, and WebP up to 15MB.

step1.title: Upload Image
step1.desc: Drag & drop or click to select your JPG, PNG, or WebP image (up to 15MB).

step2.title: Adjust Settings
step2.desc: Set your desired quality level (10-100%) and maximum width.

step3.title: Download
step3.desc: Click compress and download your optimized image instantly.

seo.title: Why Compress Images?
seo.p1: Image compression is essential for website performance, faster loading times, and reduced bandwidth usage. Our free online image compressor uses advanced algorithms to reduce file sizes while maintaining visual quality.
seo.benefit3: Better user experience on mobile devices
seo.benefit4: Optimized images for social media sharing
seo.p3: All processing happens in your browser using Web Workers - your images are never uploaded to any server, ensuring complete privacy and security.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: Is my image uploaded to a server?
faq.a1: No! All compression happens directly in your browser. Your images never leave your device, ensuring complete privacy.
faq.a2: We support JPG/JPEG, PNG, and WebP formats up to 15MB file size.
faq.q3: How much can I reduce file size?
faq.a3: Typically 50-80% reduction depending on the original image and quality settings chosen.

converter.title: Image Format Converter
converter.desc: Convert images between JPG, PNG, and WebP formats instantly in your browser.

step1.title: Select Image
step1.desc: Upload any image file (JPG, PNG, WebP, GIF, BMP supported).

step2.title: Choose Format
step2.desc: Select your desired output format (WebP, JPG, or PNG).

step3.title: Convert & Save
step3.desc: Click convert and download your new image instantly.

seo.title: Understanding Image Formats
seo.p1: Choosing the right image format is crucial for web performance and quality. Here's a comparison:
seo.webp: Modern format by Google offering 25-35% smaller file sizes than JPG/PNG with similar quality. Best for web use.
seo.jpg: Ideal for photographs and complex images with many colors. Uses lossy compression.
seo.png: Perfect for images requiring transparency or sharp edges (logos, graphics). Uses lossless compression.
seo.p2: Our converter uses HTML5 Canvas API for instant, client-side conversion. Your images never leave your device.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: WebP offers 25-35% smaller file sizes than JPG/PNG with similar quality, making your website load faster.
faq.a2: You control the quality slider. Higher values preserve more quality but result in larger files.
faq.a3: Currently, animated GIFs will be converted to a static image (first frame).

qrcode.title: QR Code Generator
qrcode.desc: Generate high-resolution QR codes for URLs, text, or any content instantly.

step1.title: Enter Content
step1.desc: Type your URL, text, phone number, or any content you want to encode.

step2.title: Customize
step2.desc: Choose your preferred size and color for the QR code.

step3.title: Generate & Download
step3.desc: Click generate and download your high-resolution QR code as PNG.

seo.title: QR Code Use Cases
seo.p1: QR codes have become essential for businesses and individuals. Common use cases include:
seo.use1: Website URLs - Direct users to your website instantly
seo.use2: Business cards - Share contact information digitally
seo.use3: Product packaging - Link to manuals or support pages
seo.p2: Our QR generator creates high-resolution codes that scan reliably on any device.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: What can I encode in a QR code?
faq.a1: URLs, plain text, phone numbers, email addresses, WiFi credentials, and more.
faq.a2: 256px is good for digital use. Choose 512px or 1024px for print materials.
faq.a3: No! QR codes generated here are static and never expire. They contain the data directly.

blog.section1_title: How to Download TikTok Videos in 2026
blog.section1_content:
Downloading TikTok videos without watermark has never been easier. In 2026, SaveTikFast remains the fastest and most reliable solution for saving your favorite TikTok content. Whether you're using an iPhone 16 with iOS 18, Samsung Galaxy S25 with Android 15, or a PC running Windows 11 or macOS Sonoma, our online tool works seamlessly across all platforms.

Unlike other video download platforms that require app installations or registrations, SaveTikFast works directly in your browser. Simply copy the TikTok video link, paste it into our downloader, and click download. Your video will be saved in HD or 4K quality without the annoying TikTok watermark.

Our service supports all major browsers including Google Chrome 130, Safari 18, Mozilla Firefox, Microsoft Edge, and even mobile browsers on Xiaomi, OnePlus, Oppo, and Huawei devices.
blog.section2_content:
Want to convert TikTok to MP3? Our audio extractor pulls the sound from any TikTok video in high quality up to 320kbps. This is perfect for:

â€¢ Creating custom ringtones from trending TikTok sounds
â€¢ Saving your favorite TikTok songs for offline listening
â€¢ Extracting voiceovers and audio clips for your own content
â€¢ Building a collection of viral sounds and music

The MP3 converter works on all devices - from the latest iPhone 16 Pro Max to budget Android phones. No special apps needed, just paste the link and download your audio file instantly.
blog.section3_content:
TikTok Slideshows (also called Photo Carousels) have become incredibly popular in 2026. Our slideshow downloader saves every image from the carousel in original quality, packaged as a convenient ZIP file. Perfect for saving aesthetic photo dumps, tutorials, and memes.

TikTok Stories disappear after 24 hours, making them harder to save. Our story downloader works 100% anonymously - the creator will never know you downloaded their story. This works on all devices including iPad Pro, Android tablets, and Chromebooks.

Whether you're archiving content for inspiration or saving memories, SaveTikFast provides the most reliable solution available online.

Our service is designed to be fast, free, and completely anonymous. We believe in providing valuable tools without compromising user privacy.
